#Your first day as a rifleman!
- Just woke up from cryosleep? Well you're probably hungry, so you should head to the food vendor and get something to eat. - Make sure to also take a canteen with you so you have water.
\n
- Next head to the standard equipment rack to get your armor and storage!
\n
- And finally, visit the automated weapons rack to pick a weapon and mags to go with it! We recommend the M54C Assault Rifle for beginners. - Also make sure to grab a few armor piercing (AP) mags for the heavier xenonids! They'll be impossible to kill otherwise.
\n
- Now you're ready to kill xenonids! Try to find the meeting room with your squadmates if the operation hasn't started yet. - Otherwise, ask around for help finding the dropship and get in there!
- If you need any help, try to find your local mentor, the SEA. You can also ahelp by pressing F1.
